parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: BizType
parameters.description: The business type. You can specify a model. The default value is the domain name.

parameters.name: OssBucket
parameters.description: The name of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

parameters.name: OssEndpoint
parameters.description: The endpoint of the OSS bucket.

parameters.name: OssObject
parameters.description: The name of the storage file in OSS.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
